home.title: Manage your finances simply and smartly
home.subtitle: Take control of your financial future with powerful tools for expense tracking, bill management, and financial planning. Everything you need in one secure, intuitive platform.

features.title: Everything you need to manage your finances
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed to make financial management effortless

expenseTracking.title: Expense Tracking
expenseTracking.description: Monitor your spending across categories and identify areas for improvement with detailed analytics.

billManagement.title: Bill Management
billManagement.description: Never miss a payment again with automated reminders and due date tracking for all your bills.

financialInsights.title: Financial Insights
financialInsights.description: Get personalized insights and recommendations to optimize your financial health and savings.

secureData.title: Bank-Level Security
secureData.description: Your financial data is protected with enterprise-grade encryption and security protocols.

benefits.title: Join thousands of users taking control of their finances

upcomingBills.title: Upcoming Bills
upcomingBills.empty: You're all caught up on payments!

recentExpenses.title: Recent Expenses
recentExpenses.subtitle: Top Spending Categories
recentExpenses.empty: You haven't added any expenses to this period yet!

signIn.title: Sign in to your account
signIn.demoAccount: For testing purposes, you can use the following credentials to log in:

bills.title: Bills
bills.subtitle: Manage your bills and never miss a payment again. Stay on top of your bills and avoid late fees with our easy-to-use bill management system.

add.title: Add New Bill
add.description: Add a new bill to your transactions. Click to add when you're done.

edit.title: Edit Bill
edit.description: Edit your bill information. Click to confirm when you're done.

details.title: Bill Details
details.description: Here you can view detailed information about the selected bill, including its status, due date, and any associated receipts.

delete.title: Delete Bill
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this bill? All of its data will be permanently removed and this action cannot be undone.

expenses.title: Expenses
expenses.subtitle: Track your expenses and stay within your budget. Keep an eye on your spending habits and make informed decisions about your money.

add.title: Add New Expense
add.description: Add a new expense to your transactions. Click to add when you're done.

details.title: Add New Expense
details.description: Add a new expense to your transactions. Click to add when you're done.

delete.title: Delete Expense
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this expense? All of its data will be permanently removed and this action cannot be undone.

footer.tagline: Your trusted partner in financial management
